search_results.query: who is the man in the m&m commercial

snippet.title: Man killed in Loudoun crash
snippet.description: A pickup truck ran off Route 7 and overturned on Saturday, killing the driver, police said.

snippet.title: Man shot in car while fleeing robbery
snippet.description: Police in Baltimore County are investigating after a man was shot in the back while fleeing a robbery.

snippet.title: Man arrested in fatal stabbing in SE DC
snippet.description: Police say they've arrested a man in connection with a fatal stabbing in southeast Washington.

snippet.title: Man sentenced in USC shooting that wounded 4
snippet.description: A man who shot and wounded four people outside of a Halloween party on the University of Southern California campus was sentenced Friday to 40 years to life in prison.

snippet.title: Man charged in Kansas City-area highway shootings
snippet.description: After nearly a month of reports of gunshots being fired at vehicles and more than 100 tips, authorities announced charges Friday against a Kansas City-area man suspected in connection with about a dozen highway shootings that wounded three people.

snippet.title: Man charged in Kansas City-area highway shootings
snippet.description: After nearly a month of reports of gunshots being fired at vehicles and more than 100 tips, authorities announced charges Friday against a Kansas City-area man suspected in connection with about a dozen highway shootings that wounded three people.

snippet.title: Russia blames Kiev for new violence in eastern Ukraine
snippet.description: Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov warns that Russia will intervene if bloodshed continues after Easter shootout.

snippet.title: Emirati firm promises to send citizen into space
snippet.description: One lucky citizen of the oil-rich United Arab Emirates could soon get the chance to be rocketed into space.

snippet.title: In West Bank, teen offenders face different fates
snippet.description: The boys were both 15, with the crackly voices and awkward peach fuzz of adolescence. They lived just a few minutes away from one another in the West Bank. And both were accused of throwing stones at vehicles, one day after the other.

snippet.title: Public smoke-out marks pot holiday in Colorado
snippet.description: Tens of thousands of revelers raised joints, pipes and vaporizer devices to the sky Sunday at a central Denver park in a defiant toast to the April 20 pot holiday, a once-underground celebration that stepped into the mainstream in the first state in the nation to legalize recreational marijuana.
